instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - 15V on PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
Guys, 

Before the computer is pretty dead.
So, right now works fine, however, the PPBUS (just the charger plugged) i get 15V ( 60W original charge)
If i plug the battery with the charger, the green light start blinking.
If i plug just the battery without the charger, i get 11.89V on PPBUS.

So, did you guys any clue what happen?
Thank you

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - 15V on PPBUS_G3H
threads.message: Probably shit Chinese charger. Check R7005, R7021/22/51/52. Probably a dead ISL6259 and Q7030/35 too.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - 15V on PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
R7005, R7021/22/51/52- All ok
The charger is a 100% original.

Q7035:
Pin 5 = 16V
Pin 4 = 0V

Q7030
Both Sides 16V

[URL="https://store.rossmanngroup.com/isl6259ahrtz.html"]ISL6259[/URL] - I don't replace yet.
CHGR_PHASE - 16V ( but is 12V on the schematic )

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - 15V on PPBUS_G3H
threads.message: Dead ISL then with possible dead Q7030/35 like duke said. Lets us know how it works after replacing the ISL

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - 15V on PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
Replaced and still CHGR_PHASE - 16V
And my PPBUS still 16V is crazy!

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - 15V on PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
Resistance of PPDCIN_G3H_CHGR to CHGR_PHASE in Ohms?
Voltage of CHGR_UGATE?

You probably have a dead Q7030 and this may have killed the new ISL again as well

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - 15V on PPBUS_G3H
threads.message: You must replace the ISL and Q7030/35 all at the same time. Also check the feedback resistors and traces, R7021/22/51/52.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - 15V on PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
I just replaced the Q7030/35 and ISL and works!

Thank you for all the help!!!
